item.title: Hello World from EMBA
QNAP firmware extractor module - from 0 to full firmware analysis
item.description: On one of our last penetration tests we had a QNAP device in front of us. While we started investigating the device via the network, we also wanted to use our firmware scanner EMBA for the firmware analysis tasks. The firmware was available from the QNAP download site and starting EMBA with the default profile looks like a quick win. After a while we realised that EMBA was running into the deep-extraction mode and finally failed extracting the needed firmware.
